title.rendered: Summer Internship 2025 at NIT Tiruchirappalli [For UG Students, 4-8 Weeks, May 1-July 31]: Apply by March 31

content.rendered:
Applications are invited for Summer Internship 2025 at NIT Tiruchirappalli for UG Students. The last date of application is March 31.

About the Summer Internship at NITT

National Institute of Technology Tiruchirappalli (NITT) is inviting undergraduate students from various Colleges, Institutes and Universities to pursue internship under the guidance of a faculty mentor of NITT. The undergraduate students will get an opportunity to interact with the NITT faculty mentor. The program is beneficial for students who are doing their under graduation.

Eligibility

Undergraduate students from various Colleges, Institutes and Universities to pursue internship.

Faculty Mentors

The list of faculty mentors from the various departments at NITT available in the institution website. The prospective candidates may select a faculty mentor depending on the match of their interests and of the faculty mentor. At NITT, faculty mentor will interact with the undergraduate students. The scope of training and number of contact hours can be decided with mutual consent of NITT and the undergraduate student depending upon the nature of work.

How to Apply?

The prospective undergraduate student has to directly interact with the faculty mentor of NITT through email and get the consent for the internship. After receiving the consent, the undergraduate student can then fill in the application in google form.

Duration & Period

  • Duration: 4 weeks (minimum), 8 weeks (maximum)
  • Period of Internship: May 1st, 2025 – July 31st, 2025
  • Within the above internship period, the student can complete their internship for a minimum period of 4 weeks and a maximum period of 8 weeks (irrespective of the start date) based on the convenience of the student and the faculty mentor of the respective department.

Deadline

Last Date of Application: 31st March, 2025.

Certification

A Certificate will be issued by the respective Department Faculty Mentor on the successful completion of the internship for the undergraduate students and submission of the report to Associate Dean (R&C)-Industry and outreach through faculty mentor of NITT.
